segments.text: hi , come on in . Can I take your coat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: sure , thanks . I brought you a bottle of wine as well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you're the first guest to arrive . I'll just put your coat away and then I'll get you something to drink .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: should I take my shoes off ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: this is a very nice place . How long have you been living here now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: just over three weeks . Would you like a drink ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've got white wine , red wine , gin and tonics , ginger ale , lemonade , orange juice , and sprite .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll have a glass of red wine please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: one glass of red wine coming up !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: so how many people are coming for the dinner tonight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: there's just going to be 6 of us tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: oh , I thought there were going to be eight . who isn't coming ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Marcia and Paul called to cancel at the last moment . Paul was running late and Marcia wasn't feeling well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that's too bad.They ' re such good company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think there's someone at the door .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: excuse me while I go and get that .
segments.speaker: S2
